abstract: A fatal accident in August led Toyota to step up its inquiry of unintended acceleration, yet only last week did it come to terms with the problem’s scope.
snippet: A fatal accident in August led Toyota to step up its inquiry of unintended acceleration, yet only last week did it come to terms with the problem’s scope.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  The 911 call came at 6:35 p.m. on Aug. 28 from a car that was speeding out of control on Highway 125 near San Diego.

headline.main: Toyota’s Slow Awakening to a Deadly Problem
headline.print_headline: Toyota’s Slow Awakening to a Deadly Problem

abstract: The parts for the gas pedal solution are on their way to dealers, whose staffs are being trained for a process that takes about a half-hour.
snippet: The parts for the gas pedal solution are on their way to dealers, whose staffs are being trained for a process that takes about a half-hour.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT    Toyota, struggling to eliminate questions surrounding millions of its vehicles, announced a repair on Monday to stop gas pedals from possibly sticking and causing cars to speed up unexpectedly.

headline.main: With Eye on Its Reputation, Toyota Issues Repair for Pedal
headline.print_headline: Toyota, Eyeing Its Reputation, Issues Repair for Gas Pedals

abstract: Some details on which cars are involved and what Toyota is telling customers about protecting themselves and getting the problem fixed.
snippet: Some details on which cars are involved and what Toyota is telling customers about protecting themselves and getting the problem fixed.
lead_paragraph: Toyota said on Monday that its dealers in the United States would begin repairing later this week 2.3 million vehicles e involved in a recall for accelerator pedals that could potentially stick. Here are some details about the situation.

headline.main: Answers to Questions About Toyota’s Repair Plans
headline.print_headline: Answers to Questions About Toyota’s Repair Plans
